Landing.title: Monitor Competitors. Digest AI News.
Landing.subtitle: The ultimate intelligence command center for SaaS founders and developers. Track pricing changes and filter global AI trends in one unified dashboard.
Landing.feature1_desc: High-precision HTML tracking to instantly spot subtle changes in your competitors' product matrices and pricing pages.
Landing.feature2_desc: Curated AI news delivered straight to your inbox. Filters out the noise to extract high-value signals from top tech sources.
Landing.feature3_desc: Powered by advanced Large Language Models, providing clear technical insights on 'what changed' and 'why it matters'.
Landing.feature4_desc: Automatically translates across 6 major languages, breaking down information barriers for seamless access to global AI intelligence.
Landing.contact_desc: Have questions or need enterprise support? Feel free to reach out.

Onboarding.title: Welcome aboard!
Onboarding.subtitle: Let's get your command center ready. What industry are you tracking?

WatchBot.tooltip: Pages added here are continuously monitored in the background. Structural DOM changes and pricing updates will trigger alerts.
WatchBot.title: Battlecards
WatchBot.subtitle: Your global overview of tracked competitors.
WatchBot.manage_urls_desc: Add or remove specific tracked pages for this competitor.
WatchBot.add_desc: Enter the details of a competitor you want to continuously monitor. Vantage will track their public shifts automatically.
WatchBot.discover_placeholder: e.g., I want to monitor JD Cloud's official website updates

empty.title: No Competitors Watched
empty.desc: Add a domain to start tracking their public shifts immediately.

Timeline.not_found: Competitor not found or access denied.

empty.title: All Clear
empty.desc: No changes detected yet for this competitor.

NewsBot.tooltip: An automated intelligence feed. Once subscribed, high-value industry signals will be pushed to your configured channel as concise summaries.
NewsBot.title: NewsBot Stream
NewsBot.subtitle: Your daily, curated AI intelligence feed from top global sources.
NewsBot.success_sub: üéâ Successfully subscribed to the Daily Stream!
NewsBot.failed_sub: ‚ùå Failed to subscribe. Please try again.
NewsBot.subscribed_desc: You are currently subscribed to the NewsBot daily automated digest stream.

Settings.title: Settings
Settings.subtitle: Manage your account settings, billing, and alert preferences.

billing.title: Subscription Plan
billing.current: You are currently on the {plan} plan.
billing.free_desc: Upgrade to Pro to unlock Smart Alerts and track more competitors.
billing.pro_desc: Unlock full access to real-time Smart Alerts and continuously monitor up to 50 competitors.

alerts.title: WatchBot Alerts
alerts.desc: Define criteria for when WatchBot should send you notifications.
alerts.pro_feature_desc: Smart Alerts are only available on the Pro plan. Upgrade to receive real-time notifications for critical changes.

profile.title: Profile Information
profile.desc: Update your personal and company details.

newsbot.title: NewsBot Subscriptions
newsbot.desc: Manage your active AI news intelligence channels.

Auth.login_desc: Enter your email below to login to your workspace
Auth.register_desc: Enter your email below to create your workspace
Auth.code_sent: Verification code sent to your email.
Auth.reset_desc: Enter your email and standard info to reset your password
Auth.reset_success: Password reset successfully. You can now log in.
